## North Carolina Citizenship Requirement for Voting Amendment (2024)

“[ ] FOR      [ ] AGAINSTConstitutional amendment to provide that only a citizen of the United States who is 18 years of age and otherwise possessing the qualifications for voting shall be entitled to vote at any election in this State.[4]”
